name: Robin
description: A tactician of Ylisse and Chrom's close ally. Loves the strange creatures she finds on the beach. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.
insights: Robin is the only hero with Deft Harpoon+.
Robin is the only hero with Deft Harpoon.
Robin is the only hero with Lance Valor 3.
Robin is the only hero with Lance Valor 2.
Robin is the only hero with Lance Valor 1.
Robin has the lowest <abbr title="Health Points">HP</abbr> potential possible among Lance heroes.

dialogue.text: Hi, I'm Robin. I may have been on vacation in the Outrealms... But I can't turn my back on anyone who needs a sound battle strategy!
I got envious of Chrom and the others in their swimsuits, so I tried one on... Look at me now! Summoned to another world... I didn't expect that!
I had so much fun at the resort! I helped out a friend with body oil, fed another one coconut brittle... I even threw lances and caught a weird creature in a tide pool!
Put me on the front lines! This swimsuit may not offer much protection, I admit... But a true tactician adjusts their strategy along with their outfit!
I'd love it if you and I took a trip to the sea together, someday... I don't have many memories, so I'd love to see something besides a battlefield.
I've been keeping my eyes peeled... Seems like I'm one of the few who's dressed in so little. I feel...exposed.
Greetings to you from your friend <Friend Name>! This swimsuit? It'll throw off the enemy's concentration! Tell me, can you focus on battle right now? Nope!
My plan for summer fun is paying off!
This clothing is so light that I can move around with ease.
What I didn't factor in was sunstroke...
You have plans for me? Great! Let's tackle the summer together!

We did a good job out there, despite the heat. Did you lose focus during the battle? No? That's good! At the resort, fighting in the heat didn't bother me one bit, but here...it does. It's strange. Maybe it's because there, I was focused on strategy! You know what I'm talking about, don't you? I'm so glad we met. It's nice to have another tactician to talk to. You understand what I'm saying...  I had a great time at the resort, but I think it's even more fun to talk about strategy like this. And it doesn't hurt that you're letting me take a vacation from being a tactician during battle! I hope we can keep talking like this... Two tacticians, striving for the ultimate strategy!
